title: John Hancock Tax Advantaged Dividend Income Fund (HTD) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: John Hancock Tax Advantaged Dividend Income Fund ( HTD  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.138 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 30, 2019. Shareholders who purchased HTD prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 18th quarter that HTD has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $27.06, the dividend yield is 6.12%.
The previous trading day's last sale of HTD was $27.06, representing a -0.88% decrease from the 52 week high of $27.30 and a 38.56% increase over the 52 week low of $19.53.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the HTD Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
